definitions: Takes in or soaks up (liquid, heat, or other energy) without reflecting or transmitting it.
Takes in and incorporates (information, experiences, or ideas).
Reduces the effect of a force or impact.
Takes up and uses (resources or time).
Becomes completely engrossed or immersed in (an activity or situation).
examples: The car's suspension absorbs the bumps.
The project absorbs a lot of resources.
He absorbs himself in his work.
